title: Cave moss
content:
Cave moss is an item that is necessary for the Nullify More Corruption quest. It can be found within the Grachnid Cave room within the Mine of Mantuban.

As part of the main quest series for the player, it alongside other glowing items are used to purify a corrupted crystal that is having negative geological effects within the mine, as well as physical effects on those who come into contact with its magic.
